This contract is the one responsible to send here the voting configurations once they are bridged.","gasLimit":"max number of gas to spend on receiving chain (L1) when sending back the voting contract without owner. DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().details: Return cached value if chainId matches cache, otherwise recomputes separator

returns._0: The domain separator of the token at current chain

closeAndSendVote(uint256).details: This method will trigger the bridging flow

params.proposalId: id of the proposal to close the vote on and send the voting result to governance

params.crossChainController: address of the CrossChainController contract deployed on current chain. This contract is the one responsible to send here the voting configurations once they are bridged.
params.gasLimit: max number of gas to spend on receiving chain (L1) when sending back the voting results
params.l1VotingPortal: address of the L1 Voting Portal contract that communicates with this voting machine
params.l1VotingPortalChainId: id of the L1 chain where the voting portal is deployed
params.votingStrategy: address of the new VotingStrategy contract

returns._0: information to start a proposal vote, including proposalId, blockHash and votingDuration
information to vote on a proposal, including proposalId, voter, support, votingTokens

params.proposalId: id of the proposal to retrieve

returns._0: the proposal information without the users vote

params.proposalId: id of the proposal to retrieve the state of
id of the proposal to retrieve the voting configuration from

getProposalsVoteConfigurationIds(uint256.details: This is mainly used to get a list of proposals that require automation in some step of the proposal live cycle.

params.size: length of proposal ids to ask for.
params.skip: number of proposal ids to skip. from latest in the list of proposal ids with voting configuration

params.proposalId: id of the proposal to retrieve the vote from
params.user: address of the user that voted

returns._0: the vote (support and voting power) emitted

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.message: bytes bridged containing the desired information
params.originChainId: id of the chain where the message originated
params.originSender: address of the sender of the bridged message

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

startProposalVote(uint256).details: this method can be called by anyone, requiring that the appropriate conditions are met. basically that the proper roots have been registered. It can also be called internally when the bridged message is received and the the required roots have been registered

params.proposalId: id of the proposal to start the vote on.

returns._0: the id of the proposal that had the vote started on.

submitVote(uint256,bool,(address,uint128.details: A vote does not need to use all the tokens allowed, can be a subset

params.proposalId: id of the proposal on which the vote will be cast
params.support: boolean indicating if the vote is in favor or against the proposal
params.votingBalanceProofs: list of objects containing the information necessary to vote using the tokens allowed on the voting strategy.

params.proofOfRepresentation: proof that can validate that msg.sender is the voter representative
params.support: boolean, true = vote for, false = vote against

params.proofOfRepresentation: proof that can validate that msg.sender is the voter representative
params.signatureParams: object containing the necessary signature parameters

params.r: r part of the voter signature
params.s: s part of the voter signature
params.support: boolean, true = vote for, false = vote against
params.v: v part of the voter signature

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

updateGasLimit(uint256).details: this method should have a owner gated permission. But responsibility is relegated to inheritance

CROSS_CHAIN_CONTROLLER().notice: method to get the address of the CrossChainController contract deployed on current chain

DATA_WAREHOUSE().notice: method to get the DataWarehouse contract

DOMAIN_SEPARATOR().notice: Get the v4 compatible domain separator

GOVERNANCE().notice: method to get the Governance contract address

L1_VOTING_PORTAL().notice: method to get the VotingPortal of the origin / receiving chain (L1)

L1_VOTING_PORTAL_CHAIN_ID().notice: method to get the chain id of the origin / receiving chain (L1)

NAME().notice: method to get the contract name for permits digest

REPRESENTATIVES_SLOT().notice: method to get the representatives mapping slot in Governance contract

VOTE_SUBMITTED_BY_REPRESENTATIVE_TYPEHAS.notice: method to get the vote submitted by representative type hash for permits digest

VOTE_SUBMITTED_TYPEHASH().notice: method to get the vote submitted type hash for permits digest

VOTING_ASSET_WITH_SLOT_RAW().notice: method to get the voting asset with slot signature

VOTING_ASSET_WITH_SLOT_TYPEHASH().notice: method to get the voting asset with slot type hash for permits digest

VOTING_STRATEGY().notice: method to get the VotingStrategy contract

closeAndSendVote(uint256).notice: method to close a vote on a proposal specified by its id and send the results back to governance

decodeMessage(bytes).notice: method to decode a message from from governance chain

decodeProposalMessage(bytes).notice: method to decode a proposal message from from governance chain

decodeVoteMessage(bytes).notice: method to decode a vote message

getProposalById(uint256).notice: method to get a proposal information specified by its id

getProposalState(uint256).notice: method to get the state of a proposal specified by its id

getProposalVoteConfiguration(uint256).notice: method to get the voting configuration of a proposal specified by its id

getProposalsVoteConfigurationIds(uint256.notice: method to get a paginated list of proposalIds. The proposals are taken from a list of proposals that have received vote configuration from governance chain

getUserProposalVote(address,uint256).notice: method to get the vote set by a user on a proposal specified by its id

receiveCrossChainMessage(address,uint256.notice: method called by CrossChainController when a message has been confirmed

startProposalVote(uint256).notice: method to start a vote on a proposal specified by its id.

submitVote(uint256,bool,(address,uint128.notice: method to cast a vote on a proposal specified by its id

submitVoteAsRepresentative(uint256,bool,.notice: Function to register the vote of user as its representative

submitVoteAsRepresentativeBySignature(ui.notice: Function to register the vote of user as its representative with a signed message

submitVoteBySignature(uint256,address,bo.notice: Function to register the vote of user that has voted offchain via signature

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory) pure external returns (enum IVotingPortal.MessageType,bytes memory)

documentation.text:
@notice method to update the gasLimit
 @param gasLimit the new gas limit
